basics.name: Yordi Castro
basics.label: Full Stack Developer | React, Node JS, .NET, Flutter | Specialized in Modern Web Solutions

avatar.alt: Yordi Castro Avatar - Person in a hoodie using a laptop, anonymous hacker icon

basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with over 1 year of professional experience in building web applications and digital solutions. Specialized in modern technologies, clean architectures, microservices, and SOLID principles. Adaptable, self-taught, and passionate about continuous learning, I bring strong analytical abilities, collaborative teamwork in agile environments, and effective technical communication. Committed to delivering robust and efficient solutions that integrate business requirements and end-user experience.

experience.name: 4Geeks
experience.summary: Lead and Full Stack development across web, mobile, and desktop projects for B2B/B2C in agile settings. Focused on efficient architecture, continuous improvement, cross-team collaboration, and top-tier user experience within the 4Geeks ecosystem.
highlights: Led the end-to-end development of the official 4Geeks mobile application (Flutter), integrating secure authentication, sales management, and real-time payment link generation through REST API consumption and UX optimization.
Directed the full creation of MARKET-APP (Electron + React), a self-service solution with secure session handling, internationalization (i18n), and a robust authentication and payment architecture.

Developed a real-time messaging system (Angular + Firebase) with modern chat features, enabling direct communication, notifications, and intuitive conversation management between candidates and recruiters.
Redesigned the ERPNext hospital system by adapting its UI to the 4Geeks visual system using modular CSS, achieving consistent branding and better experience across all devices.

experience.name: INTA Costa Rica
experience.summary: Development and delivery of a comprehensive inventory management system for the National Institute for Innovation and Technology Transfer in Agriculture, covering all key software lifecycle phases.
highlights: Collaborated closely with stakeholders to gather requirements and led architectural design, laying the technical foundation for a scalable, secure, and maintainable system.
Developed and deployed frontend and backend modules using Blazor and C#, implementing multi-level user access management and optimizing SQL Server database performance.
Implemented automated testing, incident monitoring, technical documentation, and production deployment to ensure quality, user adoption, seamless data migration, and continuous system operation.

experience.name: Lácteos El Torito
experience.summary: Designed and developed a professional website to enhance the digital presence and branding of Lácteos El Torito, showcasing their product catalog and providing a modern, attractive user experience.
highlights: Led client sessions to define brand values, business goals, and functional requirements, ensuring strategic product alignment.
Designed and implemented a complete visual system—color palette, typography, and UI components—consistent with brand identity and fully responsive across devices.
Developed and launched the website using Astro and optimized JavaScript, integrating validated forms and email marketing services, achieving a Google Lighthouse performance score above 90.

certificates.name: Python, Data Science in OCI and Oracle Analytics – ONE
SQL with Oracle MySQL Server – ONE
